newsitem.title: HONG KONG: HK 91-day bills average accepted yield 5.28 pct.
newsitem.headline: HK 91-day bills average accepted yield 5.28 pct.

text.p: The average accepted yield of 91-day Exchange Fund bills at Tuesday's tender was 5.28 percent, the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) said.
This compared with three-month HIBOR of 5.93750 percent at 0300 GMT and the average accepted yield of 5.22 percent at last week's tender of the quarterly bills.
Bids for the HK$2.0 billion issue were HK$4.25 billion versus HK$6.4 billion at the previous tender, the HKMA said.
